CHOOSE vChoiceLength FROM #VALUES FOR +
   (LJS(PREFX,1) & (LJS(DESCRIPT,35))),FULLLENGTH FROM FLENGTHS WHERE FULLLENGTH <> 100  +
  ORDER BY PREFX ASC  +
  TITLE 'Selecto Largo' CAPTION 'Largo' +
  LINES 15 OPTION TITLE_FONT_NAME Verdana |TITLE_FONT_SIZE 10 +
  |TITLE_FONT_COLOR 13209 |TITLE_BOLD ON |LIST_FONT_NAME Verdana +
  |LIST_FONT_SIZE 8 |THEMENAME R:Base Rocks!
